com.github.lecogiteur.csvbang.pool
Interface CsvFilePool

All Known Implementing Classes:
MultiCsvFilePool, OneByOneCsvFilePool, SimpleCsvFilePool
public interface CsvFilePool

This Interface permit to implements different pool of file. The pool of file can manage many files on size, number of record or another criteria. The pool deliver a file to a CSV reader or writer. A pool manage only one type of CSV file. A pool is created for each type.

Version:
0.1.0
Author:
Tony EMMA
